data.message: Designed and implemented V6 UI states: Created Pencil mockup with loading skeletons (waveform bars), empty states (no-results, no-matches), error states (connection, server). Implemented as React components with variants. Demo page at /home-v6/states.
data.task: Designed and implemented V6 UI states
data.outcome: Created Pencil mockup with loading skeletons (waveform bars), empty states (no-results, no-matches), error states (connection, server). Implemented as React components with variants. Demo page at /home-v6/states.
